AircraftDetails.description: AircraftDetails contains Wingbits aircraft enrichment data.

BattleForceSummary.description: BattleForceSummary contains fleet-wide ship count statistics.

totalShips.description: Total ships in the battle force.

BoundingBox.description:
BoundingBox represents a rectangular geographic area defined by its corners.
 Used for spatial queries to filter results within a geographic region.

Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

FlightEnrichment.description: FlightEnrichment contains additional data from Wingbits aircraft database.

GeoCoordinates.description: GeoCoordinates represents a geographic location using WGS84 coordinates.

GetAircraftDetailsBatchRequest.description: GetAircraftDetailsBatchRequest looks up multiple aircraft by ICAO 24-bit hex.

GetAircraftDetailsBatchResponse.description: GetAircraftDetailsBatchResponse contains the batch lookup results.

configured.description: Whether the Wingbits API is configured.

fetched.description: Number of aircraft successfully fetched from upstream.

results.description: Map of icao24 -> aircraft details for found aircraft.

GetAircraftDetailsRequest.description: GetAircraftDetailsRequest looks up a single aircraft by ICAO 24-bit hex.

GetAircraftDetailsResponse.description: GetAircraftDetailsResponse contains the aircraft enrichment data.

configured.description: Whether the Wingbits API is configured.

GetTheaterPostureRequest.description: GetTheaterPostureRequest specifies the theater to assess.

theater.description: Theater name (e.g., "indo-pacific", "european", "middle-east"). Empty for all theaters.

GetUSNIFleetReportRequest.description: GetUSNIFleetReportRequest requests the latest USNI Fleet Tracker report.

forceRefresh.description: When true, bypass cache and fetch fresh data from USNI.

GetUSNIFleetReportResponse.description: GetUSNIFleetReportResponse returns the parsed USNI Fleet Tracker report.

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache.

stale.description: Whether the cached data is stale (served after a fetch failure).

GetWingbitsStatusRequest.description: GetWingbitsStatusRequest checks whether the Wingbits enrichment API is configured.

GetWingbitsStatusResponse.description: GetWingbitsStatusResponse indicates whether Wingbits is available.

configured.description: Whether the Wingbits API key is configured on the server.

ListMilitaryFlightsRequest.description: ListMilitaryFlightsRequest specifies filters for retrieving military flight data.

aircraftType.description: MilitaryAircraftType represents the classification of a military aircraft.

operator.description: MilitaryOperator represents the military branch or force operating an asset.

ListMilitaryFlightsResponse.description: ListMilitaryFlightsResponse contains military flights and clusters.

MilitaryFlight.description: MilitaryFlight represents a tracked military aircraft from OpenSky or Wingbits.

aircraftType.description: MilitaryAircraftType represents the classification of a military aircraft.

confidence.description: MilitaryConfidence represents confidence in asset identification.

destination.description: ICAO code of the destination airport.

firstSeenAt.description: First seen time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

lastSeenAt.description: Last seen time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

onGround.description: Whether the aircraft is on the ground.

operator.description: MilitaryOperator represents the military branch or force operating an asset.

origin.description: ICAO code of the origin airport.

verticalRate.description: Vertical rate in feet per minute.

MilitaryFlightCluster.description: MilitaryFlightCluster represents a geographic cluster of military flights.

activityType.description: MilitaryActivityType represents the assessed type of military activity.

dominantOperator.description: MilitaryOperator represents the military branch or force operating an asset.

flightCount.description: Number of flights in the cluster.

PaginationRequest.description: PaginationRequest specifies cursor-based pagination parameters for list endpoints.

cursor.description: Opaque cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string for the first page.

pageSize.description: Maximum number of items to return per page (1 to 100).

PaginationResponse.description: PaginationResponse contains pagination metadata returned alongside list results.

nextCursor.description: Cursor for fetching the next page. Empty string indicates no more pages.

totalCount.description: Total count of items matching the query, if known. Zero if the total is unknown.

TheaterPosture.description: TheaterPosture represents an assessed military posture for a geographic theater.

activeFlights.description: Number of active flights in the theater.

assessedAt.description: Assessment timestamp, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

trackedVessels.description: Number of tracked vessels in the theater.

USNIFleetReport.description: USNIFleetReport is the full parsed output of a USNI Fleet Tracker article.

items.description: Unique region names mentioned in the article.

timestamp.description: Time the report was generated, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

USNIStrikeGroup.description: USNIStrikeGroup represents a carrier strike group parsed from the article.

airWing.description: Assigned air wing (e.g., "Carrier Air Wing Nine").

carrier.description: Carrier name and hull (e.g., "USS Abraham Lincoln (CVN-72)").

items.description: Escort vessels in the strike group.

name.description: Strike group name (e.g., "Abraham Lincoln Carrier Strike Group").

USNIVessel.description: USNIVessel represents a single vessel parsed from a USNI Fleet Tracker article.

activityDescription.description: Brief activity description parsed from article prose.

articleDate.description: Publication date of the USNI article.

articleUrl.description: URL of the USNI article this vessel was parsed from.

homePort.description: Home port, if identified from the article text.

region.description: Region name where the vessel is operating.

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

post.description: GetAircraftDetails retrieves Wingbits aircraft enrichment data for a single ICAO24 hex.
GetAircraftDetailsBatch retrieves Wingbits aircraft enrichment data for multiple ICAO24 hexes.
GetTheaterPosture retrieves military posture assessments for geographic theaters.
GetUSNIFleetReport retrieves the latest parsed USNI Fleet Tracker report.
GetWingbitsStatus checks whether the Wingbits enrichment API is configured.
ListMilitaryFlights retrieves tracked military aircraft from OpenSky and Wingbits.
